```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
```



```{r }
head(iris)
ggplot(iris,aes(x = Sepal.Length, color = Sepal.Length, fill = Sepal.Width),stat_bin(30)) +
  geom_histogram() +
  theme_bw() ->practice_iris
practice_iris
ggsave("practice_plot.png",practice_iris)


```
